name: Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle
description: Consuming the Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle will add 25x Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.
